es.account_nav_info: Administrar sus datos, como usuario y contraseña
es.alarm_ftp_info: FTP Server must be enabled to trigger a movement through file upload!
es.alarm_http_info: HTTP Server must be enabled to trigger a movement through HTTP call!
es.alarm_http_reset_info: HTTP Server must be enabled to reset a movement through HTTP call!
es.alarm_smtp_info: SMTP Server must be enabled to trigger a movement through Email!
es.analyze_duration_info: Specify how many microseconds are analyzed to probe the input. A higher value will enable detecting more accurate information, but will increase latency. It defaults to 5,000,000 microseconds = 5 seconds (-analyzeduration).
es.appearance_nav_info: Cambiar el idioma o la apariencia de la interfaz
es.atleast_one_permission_required: Debe seleccionar al menos un permiso
es.audio_codec_info: Establezca el códec utilizado para codificar el audio enviado a HomeKit para HSV, debe estar basado en AAC (-acodec).
es.audio_codec_info_hksv: Set the codec used for encoding audio for HKSV, must be AAC-based (-acodec).
es.audio_info: Activar la transmisión de audio de la cámara.
es.backup_info_download: Download a backup archive of your entire camera.ui environment. This will backup the entire contents (including recordings) of your camera.ui storage directory. You can restore this later on any platform on which camera.ui is running
es.backup_info_restore: Restore a backup archive you previously made using camera.ui. Your camera.ui config, database, recordings and camera.ui user accounts will be restored
es.backup_info_shedule: A full backup of the camera.ui database is automatically created every day at 12:00:00 and kept for 7 days
es.backup_nav_info: Create and manage the backup copies from the interface
es.backup_restored: Se restauró la Copia de Seguridad
es.bitrate_info: El bitrate utilizado para la transmisión de video.
es.bitrate_info_hksv: The maximum bitrate used HKSV, in kbit/s. If not set, will use any bitrate HomeKit requests (-b:v).
es.camera_already_exists: La cámara ya se añadió anteriormente
es.camera_settings_save_info: Fields marked with (¹) can be saved only by clicking the "✓" button
es.cameras_nav_info: Manage the streaming parameters of the cameras
es.create_zipped_backup_file: Crear una copia de seguridad comprimida en .zip
es.database_information: Información de la Base de Datos
es.debug_info: Includes debugging output from the main FFmpeg process in the log.
es.disable_info: Disables the camera and removes it from HomeKit.
es.doorbellSensor_info: Exposes the doorbell device for this camera. This can be triggered with the dummy switches, MQTT messages, or via HTTP, depending on what features are enabled in the config.
es.dwell_time_info: El Tiempo de Tolerancia es el que pasa después de detectarse un movimiento, se necesita un periodo de N segundos en el que no se detecten movimientos para "reactivar" el modo de detección por defecto. Esto evita que el sensor envíe múltiples alertas por un mismo movimiento.
es.email_body_lookup_info: If camera.ui can't find out the name of the camera by the email address, you can enter a term here so that camera.ui can search the text content of the email for this term and thus assign the camera
es.email_from_info: The email from address (without everything after @) to be assigned to this camera (e.g. my test camera. If not defined, the camera name will be used)
es.email_to_info: The email to address (without everything after @) to be assigned to this camera (e.g. my test camera. If not defined, the camera name will be used)
es.encoder_options_info: Options to be passed to the video encoder.
es.encoder_options_info_hksv: Options to be passed to the video encoder for the HKSV recording process.
es.enter_new_password: Por favor, ingrese una nueva contraseña
es.excludeSwitch_info: Exposes a 'exclude' switch to HomeKit to exclude/include the camera from the interface settings within HomeKit.
es.field_must_not_be_empty: El campo no puede estar vacío
es.fill_all_required_fields: Por favor rellene todos los campos requeridos
es.forceClose_timer_info: Timer in minutes that automatically interrupts (resets) the constant detection of motion after N minutes. 0 = Disabled. Attention: If the timer is deactivated, it is up to the camera WHEN the motion detection is considered "finished" and thus the recording is stopped. This can lead to very long recordings!
es.forgotpw_content: If you have forgotten your password, you can restore it by deleting the database or importing a backup.
es.fps_info: The fps used for video stream.
es.fps_info_hksv: The maximum frame rate used for HKSV. If not set, will use any size HomeKit requests (-r).
es.height_info: The height used for video stream.
es.height_info_hksv: The maximum height used for HKSV. If not set, will use any size HomeKit requests (-s).
es.help_started: To help you get started and provide good experience with camera.ui, please complete the following configuration.
es.homebridge_restart_info: Changing the fields marked with (²) requires restart of Homebridge
es.interface_nav_info: Create new rooms or make other settings
es.label: Etiqueta
es.livestream_snapshot: Switches between live stream or snapshot interval
es.loglevel_info: Show only defined log level (Info = Show informative messages during processing. This is in addition to warnings and errors - Debug: Show everything, including debugging information - Warning: Show only warnings and errors - Error: Show only errors)
es.manufacturer_info: Ingresa el nombre del fabricante para mostrar en la aplicación Casa
es.map_audio_info: Selects the stream used for audio (-map).
es.map_video_info: Selects the stream used for video (-map).
es.max_delay_info: When receiving data over UDP, the demuxer tries to reorder received packets (since they may arrive out of order, or packets may get lost totally). This can be disabled by setting the maximum demuxing delay to zero (-max_delay).
es.max_streams_info: The maximum number of streams that will be allowed at once to this camera.
es.model_info: Ingresa el modelo para mostrar en la aplicación Casa
es.motionDoorbellSwitch_info: Enables dummy switches to trigger motion and/or doorbell, if either of those are enabled. When enabled there will be an additional switch that triggers the motion or doorbell event.
es.motionDoorbell_info: Rings the doorbell when motion is activated. This allows for motion alerts to appear on Apple TVs.
es.motionSensor_info: Exposes the motion sensor for this camera. This can be triggered with the dummy switches, MQTT messages, or via HTTP, depending on what features are enabled in the config.
es.motion_timeout_info: The number of seconds after triggering to reset the motion sensor. Set to 0 to disable resetting of motion trigger.
es.name: Nombre
es.no_roomname_defined: No se indicó un hombre de habitación
es.no_username_defined: No se indicó un nombre de usuario
es.notfound_message: Lo siento, la página que estás buscando no existe.
es.notification_text: @ detectó un nuevo moviento en la habitación %
es.notifications_alert: You have a total of % notifications
es.notifications_nav_info: Manage the Alexa, Telegram and Webhook settings
es.page_not_found: The page you requested could not be found.
es.pixel_difference_info: The color difference required to trigger motion on a pixel (the smaller the value the smaller the color difference and the larger the value the larger the color difference needed to register it as movement)
es.press_enter_to_create: Presiona %Enter% para crear una nueva etiqueta
es.privacyMode_info: Turn off the camera feed and replace it with a privacy image in HomeKit
es.privacySwitch_info: Exposes a 'privacyMode' switch to replace the camera feed with a privacy image in HomeKit
es.probe_size_info: Set probing size in bytes, i.e. the size of the data to analyze to get stream information. A higher value will enable detecting more information in case it is dispersed into the stream, but will increase latency. Must be an integer not lesser than 32. It is 5000000 by default (-probesize).
es.read_rate_info: Read input at native frame rate (-re).
es.record_on_movement_info: Enables recording video (eg on movement) through UI and NOT through external controller.
es.recording_text: The @ was taken on % by a #.
es.recording_timer_not_editable: Recording time cannot be edited. Settings can be changed in config.json.
es.recording_type_not_editable: Recording type cannot be edited. Settings can be changed in config.json.
es.recordings_alert: You have % recordings in total and # recordings were selected
es.recordings_nav_info: Manage the recording settings and specify the recording type
es.rekognition_nav_info: Image analysis for motion detection via Amazon Rekognition
es.remove_all_confirm_text: Después de presionar 'Eliminar todo' all stored @ will be irrevocably deleted. ¿Estás seguro?
es.remove_camera_confirm_text_homebridge: Do you really want to delete the camera '@'? This will also remove the camera from Homebridge!
es.reorder_queue_size_info: Packets may be received out of order, so before they can be passed onwards, they need to be reordered. Default jitter buffer size is 500. This option allows you to specify it manually. Higher values will lead to greater latency. Only applicable for reception over UDP (-reorder_queue_size).
es.reset_confirm_text: After clicking 'Reset' all stored data will be irrevocably deleted. Are you sure?
es.restore_from_backup_file: Restaurar desde un Archivo de Respaldo
es.rss_feed_widget_info: Please enter a valid RSS URL to see the feed in the widget.
es.sensitivity_info: The percentage of pixels (see Differnce) required to trigger a movement (a low sensitivity means that more pixel differences have to be detected, a high sensitivity means that less pixel differences have to be detected)
es.serialNumber_info: Ingresa el número de serie para mostrar en la aplicación Casa
es.shortcuts_widget_info: Please select the action from the list to show it in the shortcuts.
es.source_info: FFmpeg options on where to find and how to decode your camera's video stream. The most basic form is '-i' followed by your camera's URL.
es.source_info_hksv: Here you can set a custom video source for HKSV recordings only.
es.start_end_message:
Y eso es todo.
¡Disfruta de camera.ui!
es.start_info_message:
Debes cambiar tus credenciales
antes de acceder a camera.ui
es.still_image_source_info: Si su cámara también proporciona una URL para una imagen fija, se puede indicar aquí con la misma sintaxis que 'fuente'. Si no se indica, camera.ui tomará un fotograma como 'fuente'.
es.sub_source_info: Low Resolution Substream. FFmpeg options on where to find and how to decode your camera's video substream. The most basic form is '-i' followed by your camera's URL. The substream will be used to probe the stream or for motion detection through video analysis.
es.system_nav_info: Manage the backend settings of camera.ui
es.system_restart_initiated: Se inició con el reinicio del sistema
es.system_update_initiated: Se inició la actualización del sistema
es.telegram_type_not_editable: Telegram cannot be changed for this camera.
es.timeout_info: Socket TCP I/O timeout in seconds. If you have problems with hanging FFmpeg processes in the background, you can enter any value here to stop the process automatically after the entered time, if no response comes (-stimeout).
es.unbridge_info: Bridged cameras can cause slowdowns of the entire Homebridge instance. If unbridged, the camera will need to be added to HomeKit manually.
es.use_interface_timer_info: If enabled, the recording timer from camera.ui will be used for "motionTimeout".
es.username_already_exists: Este nombre de usuario ya existe
es.username_is_required: Se requiere un nombre de usuario
es.users_nav_info: Eliminar usuarios existentes o crear nuevos
es.video_codec_info: Set the codec used for encoding video sent to HomeKit, must be H.264-based. You can change to a hardware accelerated video codec with this option, if one is available (-vcodec).
es.video_codec_info_hksv: Set the codec used for encoding video for HKSV, must be H.264-based. You can change to a hardware accelerated video codec with this option, if one is available (-vcodec).
es.video_filter_info: Comma-delimited list of additional video filters for FFmpeg to run on the video. If 'none' is included, the default video filters are disabled (-filter:v).
es.videoanalysis_info: Activates Video Analysis for motion detection (a low resolution sub stream is preferred or prebuffering enabled)
es.weather_widget_info: Por favor, busca el nombre de tu ciudad en Inglés para activar el widget del clima.
es.weather_widget_info_owm: La información del clima es proporcionada por OpenWeather.
es.welcome_submessage: La interfaz web para tus cámaras con soporte para RTSP
es.width_info: El tamaño de ancho utilizado para la transmisión del video.
es.width_info_hksv: The maximum width used for HKSV. If not set, will use any size HomeKit requests (-s).
